name: Overloaded Server
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 49, Unstable.

To fit the theme, I rolled the idea of net stability. Of course when does net stability matter most? Well, how about a game with online functionality?

I never gave this character a name in game, but I've been calling her 'byte' since computers/food y'know.

A few things to mention. I added some keybinds to make things easier when playing.
R for router; F for Pc; and Spacebar for keyboard.

Also press C on the difficulty selection screen for my "custom night". I haven't gotten more than 6 points in the mode though, so good luck.
